name: vue-cool-lightbox
description: A pretty Vue.js component to display an image gallery lightbox inspired by fancybox
author: Lucas Pulliese <lucaspulliese10@gmail.com>

scripts.build: npm run build:unpkg & npm run build:es & npm run build:umd
scripts.build:umd: cross-env NODE_ENV=production rollup --config build-scripts/rollup.config.js --format umd --file dist/vue-cool-lightbox.umd.js
scripts.build:es: cross-env NODE_ENV=production rollup --config build-scripts/rollup.config.js --format es --file dist/vue-cool-lightbox.esm.js
scripts.build:unpkg: cross-env NODE_ENV=production rollup --config build-scripts/rollup.config.js --format iife --file dist/vue-cool-lightbox.min.js
